resource.description: The default version of a resource that has been registered in the CloudFormation Registry.

properties.name: TypeVersionArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type version.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type version.

properties.name: TypeName
properties.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

type.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

properties.name: VersionId
properties.description: The ID of an existing version of the resource to set as the default.

type.description: The ID of an existing version of the resource to set as the default.

attributes.description: The default version of a resource that has been registered in the CloudFormation Registry.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type. This is used to uniquely identify a ResourceDefaultVersion

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type. This is used to uniquely identify a ResourceDefaultVersion
